attributes.additional_details:
It should be a criminal offence to actively participate in the cover up of clinical negligence.

Did you realise that the current situation allows all medical professionals and their management to actively cover-up clinical negligence from the victims and there is absolutely no consequence to their actions - because it is legal?

If you have ever been subject to this or believe you have been subject to this, I encourage you to sign this petition to make this practice a criminal act.

We believe this practice to be widespread throughout the UK. This will not change until there is a law against it.
